name: Adaptability
description: Damaging Moves that share a Type with the user get +5 damage.

name: Adrenaline
description: When the user’s HP falls below 50% from direct damage, Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Aerilate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Flying-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Aftermath
description: If the user Faints from a Contact Move, the attacker loses 3 Ticks.

name: Air Lock
description: Weather has no effect while the user is in battle.

name: Allergenic
description: Poison Powder, Sleep Powder, and Stun Spore all use the same Move slot.

name: Alphabetic
description: Unown gets an extra Ability that starts with its letter of your choice. On level-up, Unown can learn any Move that starts with its letter. Unown-? chooses randomly each time. Unown-! chooses from Moves and Abilities that contain spaces or punctuation.

name: Analytic
description: The user’s Damaging Moves get +5 damage if all targeted characters already took a turn this round.

name: Anger Point
description: If the user suffers a Critical Hit, Boost their ATK by +20.

name: Anger Shell
description: When the user’s HP falls below 50% from direct damage, Boost their ATK, SATK, and SPE by +5, and Drop their DEF and SDEF by -5.

name: Antagonize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Dark-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Anticipation
description: When the user enters battle, they shudder if a foe knows a OHKO Move or a Move super-effective against the user.

name: Arena Trap
description: Foes in the user’s Zone that aren’t Immune to Ground are Trapped.

name: Armor Tail
description: Foes’ Priority Moves fail when targeting the user or Allies in Zone.

name: Aroma Veil
description: The user and Allies in Zone can’t be Infatuated, can’t have their Moves disabled, and are unaffected by Taunt, Torment, and Encore.

name: As One
description: Calyrex’s Rider form has the Abilities of Calyrex’s default form and the Pokémon it is riding.

name: Aura Break
description: The Fairy Aura and Dark Aura Abilities reduce damage instead of increasing it.

name: Bad Dreams
description: Between rounds, Sleeping foes lose 2 Ticks.

name: Ball Fetch
description: The user picks up and restores each failed Poké Ball.

name: Battery
description: The user’s Allies in Zone get +5 damage to their Special Moves.

name: Battle Armor
description: Hard plating deflects the user’s received Critical Hits into normal hits.

name: Battle Bond
description: When Greninja KOs a target, for the rest of the battle it becomes Ash-Greninja and its Water Shuriken’s Power becomes 8 and cannot do less than +6 bonus damage.

name: Beads of Ruin
description: The user’s ruinous jade magatama give -5 SDEF to characters without Beads of Ruin.

name: Beam Cannon
description: The user’s Ranged Moves get +3 to their Effect and Critical Rates.

name: Beast Boost
description: When the user KOs a target, Boost their highest Stat by +5.

name: Berserk
description: When the user’s HP falls below 50% from direct damage, Boost their SATK by +5.

name: Big Pecks
description: The user’s DEF can’t be Dropped by others.

name: Blaze
description: If the user’s HP is 3 Ticks or less, their Fire Moves get +10 damage.

name: Brimstone
description: When the user Burns a target, they also Poison it.

name: Bulletproof
description: The user is Immune to Moves with names containing “ball”, “bomb”, or “cannon”, Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Focus Blast, Octazooka, Pollen Puff, Rock Blast, Rock Wrecker, and Searing Shot.

name: Bulletproven
description: The user gets +7 damage on Moves with names containing “ball”, “bomb”, or “cannon”, Acid Spray, Aura Sphere, Barrage, Focus Blast, Octazooka, Pollen Puff, Rock Blast, Rock Wrecker, and Searing Shot.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: The user heals an extra 3 Ticks when they eat a Berry.

name: Chill
description: When the user enters battle, Drop foes’ SPE by -5.

name: Chilling Neigh
description: When the user KOs a target, Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Chlorophyll
description: In Harsh Sunlight, Boost the user’s SPE by +15.

name: Clear Body
description: The user’s purity of body means its Stats can’t be Dropped by others.

name: Cloud Nine
description: When the user enters battle, the weather becomes normal.

name: Color Change
description: After a Move damages the user, their Type changes to match the Move’s Type. (After Double/Multi-strike Moves finish.)

name: Color Guard
description:
Minior and allies that share a color with it get a bonus based on its color:

  • Red: heal a Tick between rounds
  • Orange: +5 ATK, +2 Crit Rate
  • Yellow: +5 DEF, +6 Save Bonus
  • Green: +5 SDEF, +2 Evasion
  • Cyan: heal 1 PP between rounds
  • Indigo: +5 SATK, +2 Effect Rate
  • Violet: +5 SPE, +4 Accuracy Rate
  • Black: Minior and allies without any of the above colors get +1 to all Stats, Crit Rate, Save Bonus, Evasion, Effect Rate, and Accuracy

name: Comatose
description:
The user is always Asleep, but acts normally. Comatose can’t be removed or changed.

  • The user can’t be Poisoned, Burned, or Paralyzed.
  • The user can use Sleep Talk and Snore, is affected by Dream Eater and Nightmare, and triggers extra damage from Hex and Wake-Up Slap.
  • The user can’t use Rest.

name: Commander
description: When the user enters battle, it goes in the mouth of an ally Dondozo if there is one. Commanded Dondozo get +10 each to ATK, DEF, SATK, SDEF, and SPE, but can’t switch out and the Commander can’t act or be targeted until the Dondozo faints. (Works with non-Dondozo species at GM’s discretion.)

name: Competitive
description: When a foe Drops any of the user’s Stats, Boost the user’s SATK by +10.

name: Compound Eyes
description: The user’s Moves lower their Accuracy Check by 6.

name: Contaminate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Poison-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Contrary
description: The user’s Drops become Boosts, and vice-versa.

name: Corrosion
description: The user can Poison targets regardless of their Type or Ability. (Steel still takes 0 damage from Poison Moves.)

name: Costar
description: When the user enters battle, they choose an ally to copy Boosts, Drops, and Focus Energy from.

name: Cotton Down
description: When the user is damaged by a Move, Drop other in-Zone characters’ SPE by -5.

name: Cud Chew
description: If the user eats a Berry, they regurgitate that Berry at the end of their next turn and eat it once more.

name: Curious Medicine
description: When the user enters battle, all allies reset their Boosts/Drops to +0.

name: Cursed Body
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or have their Move disabled.

name: Cute Charm
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or become Infatuated with the user (if compatible).

name: Damp
description: While the user is on the field, the Aftermath Ability and Moves Self-Destruct, Explosion, Misty Explosion, and Mind Blown fail.

name: Dancer
description: If another character uses a Move with “Dance” in the name, Aqua Step, or Clangorous Soul, immediately use that Move for 0 PP without spending the user’s turn. This can’t go infinite.

name: Dark Aura
description: While the user is on the field, all damaging Dark Moves get +5 damage.

name: Dauntless Shield
description: When the user enters battle, Boost their DEF by +5.

name: Dazzling
description: Foes’ Priority Moves fail when targeting the user or Allies in Zone.

name: Deadly Poison
description: If the user Poisons a target, they Badly Poison it instead.

name: Defeatist
description: When the user has less than 50% HP, Drop its ATK and SATK by -10.

name: Defiant
description: When a foe Drops any of the user’s Stats, Boost the user’s ATK by +10.

name: Delivery Bird
description: The user can hold 2 items at once. If something affects their held item, you choose which one.

name: Delta Stream
description: The weather becomes Strong Wind while the user is on the field. Only Primordial Sea and Desolate Land can override Delta Stream. (Electric, Ice, and Rock Moves get -1 Effectiveness.)

name: Desolate Land
description: The weather becomes Extremely Harsh Sunlight while the user is on the field. Only Primordial Sea and Delta Stream can override Extremely Harsh Sunlight. (Damaging Fire Moves get +10 damage, and Water Moves automatically fail.)

name: Dire Horn
description: Moves with “Horn” or “Head” in their name, Skull Bash, Fury Attack, Smart Strike, Psyblade, Sacred Sword, and Secret Sword get +7 damage.

name: Discipline
description: The first time per battle the user becomes Confused, Infatuated, or Flinched, cure it.

name: Disguise
description: The user’s disguise prevents damage from the first Move that damages the user, then breaks and loses a Tick. (Move effects still occur, and Multi-strike Moves still deal damage.) Repair the disguise between battles.

name: Dizzying
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or become Confused.

name: Download
description: When the user enters battle, a random foe reveals if its DEF or SDEF is lower. If DEF, Boost the user’s ATK by +5. If SDEF, Boost the user’s SATK by +5.

name: Dracolize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Dragon-Type and gain +5 damage.

name: Dragon's Maw
description: The user’s damaging Dragon Moves get +5 damage.

name: Drizzle
description: When the user enters battle, the weather becomes Rainy for 5 rounds. (Damaging Water Moves get +10 damage, and Fire Moves have their Power reduced by -10.)

name: Drought
description: The weather becomes Harsh Sunlight for 5 rounds. (Damaging Fire Moves get +10 damage, and Water Moves have their Power reduced by -10.)

name: Dry Skin
description:
The user is Immune to Water. If hit with a Water Move, ignore its effects and heal 3 Ticks. Damaging Fire Moves get +5 damage against the user.
The user loses 2 Ticks when they end a turn in Harsh Sunlight, and heals 2 Ticks when they end a turn in Rain.

name: Early Bird
description: The user has a +6 Bonus to Sleep Save Checks.

name: Earth Eater
description: The user is Immune to Ground. When hit with a Ground Move, ignore its effect and Heal the user by 3 Ticks.

name: Effect Spore
description:
Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or roll another d20:

  • 1-6: Poison the attacker.
  • 7-13: Paralyze the attacker.
  • 14+: the attacker falls Asleep.

name: Electric Cheeks
description: The user’s Electric Moves get Priority while the user has full HP.

name: Electric Surge
description: When the user enters battle, create Electric Terrain for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on Electric Terrain are immune to Sleep and damaging Electric Moves get +5 damage.)

name: Electromorphosis
description: The user becomes Charged when hit by a Physical or Special Move. (The user’s next Electric Move gets +1 Effectiveness, then they lose Charged.)

name: Emergency Exit
description: The user switches out/flees when another character’s Move drops its HP past 50%, even if Trapped. The user does not switch out if it heals its HP back over 50% immediately.

name: Enthrall
description: When the user enters battle, Drop all foes’ SDEF by -5.

name: Entry: Move
description: When the user enters battle, they automatically use the specified Move for 0 PP.

name: Eternal Palette
description:
The user knows a Move without using up a slot, based on its flower’s color:

  • Red: Roar of Time
  • Orange: Blast Burn
  • Yellow: Zap Cannon
  • Blue: Hydro Cannon
  • White: Steel Beam
  • Pink (Eternal Flower): Light of Ruin

name: Excavate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Ground-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Fairy Aura
description: While the user is on the field, all damaging Fairy Moves get +5 damage.

name: Filter
description: The user subtracts their Level from damage from incoming Super-Effective Moves.

name: Flame Body
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or get Burned.

name: Flare Boost
description: While the user is Burned, Boost their SATK by +10.

name: Flash Fire
description: The user is Immune to Fire. If hit with a Fire Move, ignore its effects and the user’s damaging Fire Moves get +5 damage for the rest of the battle. This effect does not stack.

name: Flavorite
description:
Alcremie gets the effect of the Sweet it evolved with, and certain Types can’t flee or switch out from it according to flavor:

  • Vanilla (“sweet”): Fairy and Normal
  • Ruby (“tart”): Flying and Psychic
  • Matcha (“aromatic”): Dragon and Grass
  • Mint (“refreshing”): Water and Ice
  • Lemon (“sour”): Fighting and Electric
  • Salted (“salty”): Fire and Rock
  • Ruby Swirl (“mixed”): Bug and Ghost
  • Caramel Swirl (“bitter”): Dark and Poison
  • Rainbow Swirl (“complex”): Steel and Ground

name: Flower Gift
description: In Harsh Sunlight, the user Boosts its and all allies’ ATK and SDEF by +5 each. Cherrim becomes its Sunshine Form.

name: Flower Veil
description: Allied Grass-Types in Zone (including the user) can’t have their Stats Dropped by others, and are immune to being Burned, Frozen, Paralyzed, Poisoned or Asleep.

name: Fluffy
description: Contact Moves get -1 Effectiveness against the user, but Fire Moves get +1 Effectiveness.

name: Forecast
description:
Castform’s Forme and Type match the Weather:

  • Harsh sunlight: Fire-Type Sunny Form
  • Rain: Water-Type Rainy Form
  • Snowstorm: Ice-Type Snowy Form
  • Sandstorm: Rock-Type Gritty Form
  • Other: Normal-Type Normal Form (or homebrew Formes at GM discretion)

name: Forewarn
description: When the user enters battle, reveal the Move with the most Power between their foes. If there’s a tie, reveal all the tied Moves.

name: Friend Guard
description: The user’s Allies in Zone add their Level to their DEF and SDEF. Friend Guard does not stack.

name: Frisk
description: When the user enters battle, they reveal all foes’ Held Items with their unobstructed vision.

name: Full Metal Body
description: Others can’t Drop the user’s Stats. Full Metal Body ignores Mold Breaker.

name: Fur Coat
description: The user gets an Endurance bonus equal to their Level.

name: Gale Wings
description: The user’s Flying Moves get Priority while the user has full HP.

name: Galvanize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Electric-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Germinate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Grass-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Gluttony
description: The user eats Berries that trigger at below 3 Ticks at below 5 Ticks instead.

name: Good as Gold
description: A body of solid gold makes other characters’ Status Moves fail if they target the user.

name: Gooey
description: When the user is hit by a Contact Move, Drop the attacker’s SPE by -5.

name: Gorilla Tactics
description: The user gets +5 ATK, but must repeat the first Move they use until they leave battle.

name: Grass Pelt
description: While standing on Grassy Terrain, the user’s DEF gets +10.

name: Grassy Surge
description: When the user enters battle, create Grassy Terrain for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on it heal 1 Tick between Rounds, Grass Moves get +5 damage, and Bulldoze, Earthquake and Magnitude get -1 Effectiveness.)

name: Grim Neigh
description: When the user KOs a target, Boost their SATK by +5.

name: Guard Dog
description: Other characters’ Moves and items can’t force the user to switch out, and the user Boosts their ATK by +5 instead of suffering the usual Stat Drops from Intimidate, Unintimidate, Startle, Enthrall, and Chill.

name: Gulf Stream
description: When the user enters battle, the weather becomes Strong Winds. (Electric, Ice, and Rock Moves get -1 Effectiveness.)

name: Gulp Missile
description: After using Surf or Dive, Cramorant holds Arrokuda in its mouth, or Pikachu if its HP is below 5 Ticks. Attackers damaging Cramorant make it spit out the Pokémon (even if KO’d): the attacker loses 3 Ticks, and Arrokuda Drops DEF by -5 / Pikachu inflicts Paralysis.

name: Guts
description: While Burned, Poisoned, Paralyzed, Frozen, or Asleep, Boost the user’s ATK by +10. The user doesn’t lose ATK from Burns.

name: Hadron Engine
description: When the user enters battle, create Electric Terrain for 5 rounds. The futuristic engine within the user Boosts their SATK by +5 during Electric Terrain.

name: Harvest
description: When the user eats a Berry, roll d20. On 11+, get the Berry’s effect without consuming it. This roll autosucceeds in Harsh Sunlight.

name: Hate Eater
description: The user is Immune to Dark. When hit with an Dark Move, ignore its effects and they Heal 3 Ticks.

name: Healer
description: Between rounds, before damage from Status Problems, count each Ally in Zone with the user. For each, roll d20. On 14+, cure that ally’s Status Problems.

name: Heat Sink
description: The user is Immune to Fire. When the user is hit by a Fire Move, Boost their SATK by +5. Fire Moves redirect to the user and can’t miss.

name: Heatproof
description: Fire Moves get -1 Effectiveness against the user and Burn inflicts half its usual damage.

name: Heavy Metal
description: Double the user’s Weight.

name: Honey Gather
description: Produces a Sweet Honey every Long Rest.

name: Hot Streak
description: When the user KOs a target, Boost their SATK by +5.

name: Huge Power
description: The user gets an Athletics bonus equal to their Level.

name: Hunger Switch
description: The user swaps between Full-Belly Form and Hangry Form (and this Ability’s Bonus Stats) between rounds.

name: Hustle
description: The user’s enthusiasm makes their Physical Moves raise their Accuracy Check by +4 and get +10 damage.

name: Hydration
description: In Rain, cure all of the user’s Status Problems between rounds.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: The user’s powerful pincers mean its ATK can’t be Dropped by others.

name: Ice Body
description: The user heals 1 Tick between rounds in a snowstorm.

name: Ice Face
description: The user’s icy helmet protects against 1 Physical Attack, breaking into Noice Face. Creating or switching into a snowstorm immediately restores Ice Face.

name: Ice Scales
description: Special Moves get -1 Effectiveness against the user.

name: Illuminate
description: Others can’t Drop the user’s Accuracy Rate, and the user ignores targets’ Evasion.

name: Illusion
description: When the user enters battle, they resemble a Pokémon in their party. Damaging Moves destroy the illusion.

name: Immolate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Fire-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Immunity
description: If the user becomes Poisoned, cure them.

name: Imposter
description: When the user enters battle, they automatically use Transform for 0 PP.

name: Impulsive
description: When a foe Drops any of the user’s Stats, Boost the user’s SPE by +10.

name: Infiltrator
description: The user’s Moves ignore Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Substitutes, and Mist.

name: Innards Out
description: When a damaging Move KOs the user, the attacker loses HP equal to what the user had left.

name: Inner Focus
description: The user can’t Flinch and ignores Intimidate, Unintimidate, Startle, Enthrall, and Chill.

name: Innocent Face
description: If the user’s Move last round failed, missed, was stopped by a Status Problem, or had no effect on its target(s), foes can’t target them this round.

name: Insectivize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Bug-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Insomnia
description: If the user falls Asleep, cure them. The user can’t use Rest.

name: Intimidate
description: When the user enters battle, Drop all foes’ ATK by -5.

name: Intrepid Sword
description: When the user enters battle, Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Iron Barbs
description: Attackers that hit the user with Contact Moves lose 2 Ticks.

name: Iron Fist
description: The user’s Moves with “Punch”, “Fist”, or “Hammer” in their name, Double Iron Bash, Meteor Mash, Sky Uppercut, Surging Strikes, and Wicked Blow get +7 damage.

name: Justified
description: If the user is hit by a Dark Move, their heart of justice Boosts their ATK by +5.

name: Keen Eye
description: Others can’t Drop the user’s Accuracy Rate, and the user ignores targets’ Evasion.

name: Klutz
description: The user ignores items it holds, as if it wasn’t holding them.

name: Leaf Guard
description: In Harsh Sunlight, the user is immune to persistent Status Problems and can’t use Rest.

name: Leaf Tailor
description: The user makes its clothing from leaves. Each Long Rest, pick 2 Types to get -1 Effectiveness against the user until the next Long Rest.

name: Levitate
description: The user is Immune to Ground damage, Terrain, Arena Trap, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and Rototiller.

name: Libero
description: Before the user uses a Move, their Type becomes the Move’s Type (no secondary Type.)

name: Lifedrinker
description: The user heals 1 Tick whenever it hits with a Contact Move.

name: Light Metal
description: Halve the user’s weight.

name: Lightning Rod
description: The user is Immune to Electric. If the user is hit by an Electric Move, ignore its effects and Boost their SATK by +5. Electric Moves redirect to the user and can’t miss.

name: Limber
description: If the user becomes Paralyzed, cure them.

name: Lingering Aroma
description: Attackers that hit the user with Contact Moves have their Ability changed to Lingering Aroma until they leave battle.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: If the user is Drained, the attacker instead loses the amount they would have healed.

name: Liquid Voice
description: The user’s Sonic Moves become Water-Type. (This can grant STAB.)

name: Long Reach
description: The user’s Contact Moves become Ranged.

name: Loose Cannon
description: The user’s Special Moves raise their Accuracy Check by +4 and get +10 damage.

name: Lunar Power
description: While the user is exposed to moonlight, Boost their SDEF by +10 and they heal 1 Tick between rounds.

name: Magic Bounce
description: The user redirects Status Moves and Moves that create Hazards back to the attacker.

name: Magic Guard
description: The user is immune to damage from Status Problems, hazards, weather, recoil, or Held Items. The user doesn’t lose HP from using Mind Blown, Steel Beam, or Chloroblast.

name: Magician
description: The user’s damaging Moves also steal their targets’ Held Items, if the user can hold them.

name: Magma Armor
description: If the user becomes Frozen, cure them.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Steel-Type Pokémon can’t flee or switch out from the user.

name: Marvel Scale
description: While Asleep, Paralyzed, Burned, Frozen or Poisoned, Boost the user’s DEF by +10.

name: Max Aura
description: The user’s damaging Fighting Moves get +10 damage when at 3 Ticks or less of HP.

name: Mega Launcher
description: The user’s Moves with “Pulse” or “Aura Sphere” in their names get +7 damage.

name: Merciless
description: The user’s Moves are Critical Hits on Poisoned targets.

name: Metallize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Steel-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Migraine
description: While the user’s HP is 5 Ticks or less, double the Power of their Psychic Moves.

name: Mimicry
description: In Electric, Grassy, Misty, or Psychic Terrain, change the user’s Type to match the Terrain.

name: Minus
description: Boost the user’s SATK by +10 for each ally with Plus or Minus in Zone.

name: Mirror Armor
description: Stat Drops inflicted on the user (not caused by Status Problems) are instead reflected to their source.

name: Misty Surge
description: When the user enters battle, create Misty Terrain for 5 rounds. (Characters standing on Misty Terrain are immune to Poison, Burn, Sleep, Paralysis, Freeze, and Confusion; and received Dragon-Type damage gets -1 Effectiveness.)

name: Mold Breaker
description: The user’s Moves ignores others’ Abilities during the user’s turn.

name: Momentum
description: Each consecutive turn the user hits with a damaging Move, that move gets +5 damage each future use until it misses, fails, or another Move is used. Max +20.

name: Moody
description:
Between Rounds, roll d20 to pick a Stat to Boost by +10, then again for a Stat to Drop by -5.
≥4: ATK
5–8: DEF
9–12: SATK
13–16: SDEF
17+: SPE

name: Motor Drive
description: The user is Immune to Electric. If an Electric Move hits the user, ignore its effects and Boost their SPE by +5.

name: Moxie
description: When the user KOs a target, Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Multiple
description: The user’s Multi-Strike, Double Strike, and multi-target Moves cost 2 less PP.

name: Multiscale
description: If the user is damaged by a Move at full HP, that Move gets -1 Effectiveness.

name: Multitype
description: The user’s Type matches any Plates/Z-Crystals it holds. (Can’t be nullified or replaced.)

name: Mummy
description: Attackers that hit the user with Contact Moves have their Ability changed to Mummy until they leave battle.

name: Mycelium Might
description: The user’s Status Moves Always Go Last, but ignores others’ Abilities during the user’s turn.

name: Natural Cure
description: Cure all of the user’s Status Problems when it leaves battle.

name: Neuroforce
description: The user’s damaging Super-Effective moves get +5 damage.

name: Neutralizing Gas
description: All characters ignore Abilities of other characters in Zone. When this Ability no longer applies, activate any Abilities that would have taken effect when their user entered battle, but were ignored.

name: No Guard
description: The user’s Moves can’t miss, and Moves can’t miss hitting the user.

name: Normalize
description: The user’s non-Normal Moves become Normal-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Oblivious
description: If the user becomes Infatuated, cure them. The user is immune to the Moves Captivate and Taunt, and the Abilities Intimidate, Unintimidate, Startle, Enthrall, and Chill.

name: Olympic
description: The user’s Boosts have no maximum cap.

name: Opportunist
description: If an opponent Boosts their Stats, the user seizes the opportunity to copy those Boosts.

name: Orichalcum Pulse
description: The weather becomes Harsh Sunlight for 5 rounds. The ancient pulse thrumming through the user Boosts their ATK by +5 during harsh sunlight.

name: Overcoat
description: The user is immune to damage from Sandstorm, Moves with “Powder” or “Spore” in their name, and the Effect Spore Ability.

name: Overgrow
description: If the user’s HP is 3 Ticks or less, their Grass Moves get +10 damage.

name: Own Tempo
description: If the user becomes Confused, cure them. The user ignores Intimidate, Unintimidate, Startle, Enthrall, and Chill.

name: Paralyze Touch
description: The user’s Contact Moves inflict Paralysis on 15+. If a move already has a chance of Paralyzing, increase that chance’s Effect Rate by +6.

name: Paranoia
description: While Burned, Poisoned, Paralyzed, Frozen, or Asleep, Boost the user’s SDEF by +10.

name: Parental Bond
description: The user’s single-target Moves hit twice, but the second hit gets -2 Effectiveness.

name: Pastel Veil
description: Cure in-Zone allies of Poison when the user enters battle. The user and Allies in Zone can’t be Poisoned.

name: Patterned
description:
The user’s wing pattern matches a terrain agreed on by the player and GM. Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or are inflicted with the Secret Power secondary effect of the pattern’s terrain.

Each Rest, the user may learn the Move that Nature Power calls on the pattern’s terrain.

name: Perish Body
description: Attackers that hit the user with Contact Moves cause both them and the user to suffer the effect of Perish Song.

name: Petrificate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Rock-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Pickpocket
description: After the user is hit by a Contact Move, it steals a Held Item from the attacker if it can hold it.

name: Pickup
description:
If another character consumes or drops an item (including via Fling or Natural Gift) and the user can hold that item, the user restores the item and picks it up. If multiple characters have Pickup, the highest SPE gets the item.

Once per day, roll d20 and see what you find.

name: Pixilate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Fairy-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Plus
description: Boost the user’s SATK by +10 for each ally with Plus or Minus in Zone.

name: Poison Heal
description: The user Heals 2 Ticks between rounds when Poisoned instead of losing HP.

name: Poison Point
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or get Poisoned.

name: Poison Touch
description: The user’s Contact Moves inflict Poison on 15+. If a move already has a chance of Poisoning, increase that chance’s Effect Rate by +6.

name: Polar Vortex
description: The user is Immune to Ice. When the user is hit by a Ice Move, ignore its effects and Boost their SATK by +5. Ice Moves redirect to the user and can’t miss.

name: Poltergeize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Ghost-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Power Construct
description: If Zygarde’s HP falls below 50% during an encounter, it changes into Complete Form until the end of the encounter.

name: Power Leech
description: The user’s Draining Moves get +7 damage.

name: Power of Alchemy
description: When an ally Faints, the user copies and activates that ally’s Starting Ability, except for Wonder Guard, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Multitype, RKS System, Imposter or Flower Gift.

name: Power Spot
description: The user’s Allies in Zone get +5 damage for their damaging Moves.

name: Prankster
description: The user’s Status Moves get Priority, but Dark-Types are now immune to them. Prankster doesn’t change Delayed Moves.

name: Prelude
description: The user’s Sonic Moves get Priority.

name: Pressure
description: Foes’ Moves that target the user have their PP cost go up by +1.

name: Pride
description: While Burned, Poisoned, Paralyzed, Frozen, or Asleep, Boost the user’s SATK by +10.

name: Primordial Sea
description: The weather becomes Heavy Rain while the user is on the field. Only Desolate Land and Delta Stream can override Heavy Rain. (Damaging Water Moves get +10 damage, and Fire Moves automatically fail.)

name: Prism Armor
description: The user subtracts their Level from damage from incoming Super-Effective Moves.

name: Propeller Tail
description: The user’s Moves cannot be redirected from their chosen target. (Including Ally Switch.)

name: Protean
description: Before the user uses a Move, change their Type to the Move’s Type (no secondary Type.)

name: Protosynthesis
description: Boosts the user’s currently-highest Stat by +5 during Harsh Sunlight or if the user holds Booster Energy. (The Booster Energy isn’t used up if the sunlight is harsh.)

name: Psychic Reservoir
description: The user is Immune to Psychic. When the user is hit by an Psychic Move, ignore its effects and Boost their SATK by +5. Psychic Moves redirect to the user and can’t miss.

name: Psychic Surge
description: When the user enters battle, create Psychic Terrain for 5 turns. (Characters standing on Psychic Terrain are immune to Priority and damaging Psychic Moves get +5 damage.)

name: Pugilize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Fighting-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Punk Rock
description: The user’s Sonic Moves get +5 damage and Sonic Moves get -1 Effectiveness against the user.

name: Pure Power
description: The user gets an Intensity bonus equal to their Level.

name: Purifying Salt
description: Ghost Moves get -1 Effectiveness against the user, and they are immune to persistent Status Problems.

name: Quark Drive
description: Boosts the user’s currently-highest Stat by +5 during Electric Terrain or if the user holds Booster Energy. (The Booster Energy isn’t used up if the terrain is electric.)

name: Queenly Majesty
description: Foes’ Priority Moves fail when targeting the user or Allies in Zone.

name: Quick Draw
description: On attack rolls of 15+, the user goes first. Moves with higher Priority still go first.

name: Quick Feet
description: While Poisoned, Burned, Paralyzed, Frozen, or Asleep, Boost the user’s SPE by +10. The user does not lose SPE from Paralysis.

name: Rain Dish
description: In Rain, the user heals 1 Tick between rounds.

name: Rattled
description: If the user is Intimidated, Startled, or hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost Move: Boost their SPE by +5.

name: Receiver
description: When an ally faints in battle, the user copies and activates that ally’s Starting Ability, except for Wonder Guard, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Multitype, RKS System, Imposter, or Flower Gift.

name: Reckless
description: Jump Kick, High Jump Kick, Axe Kick, Supercell Slam, and Recoil Moves get +7 damage.

name: Refrigerate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Ice-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Regal Challenge
description: When the user enters battle, all foes vote to Defy or Defer. Defy: Boost the user’s ATK and SATK by +5. Defer: Drop all foes’ ATK and SATK by -5.

name: Regenerator
description: The user heals 3 Ticks when it returns to its Poké Ball.

name: Retribution
description: When a foe KOs an ally, Boost the user’s ATK by +5.

name: Ripen
description: Double the effects of Berries the user consumes.

name: Rivalry
description: The user’s damaging Moves that target others of the same gender get +5 damage.

name: RKS System
description: The user’s Type matches the Type Memories it holds.

name: Rock Head
description: The user ignores recoil damage.

name: Rocky Payload
description: The user gets STAB for Rock Moves and can benefit from Rock Expert features.

name: Rough Skin
description: Attackers that hit the user with Contact Moves lose 2 Ticks.

name: Rowdy
description: The user’s Allies in Zone get +5 damage for their Physical Moves.

name: Run Away
description: The user can’t be Trapped and their escape attempts cannot be contested.

name: Sand Force
description: The user’s damaging Ground, Rock, and Steel Moves get +5 damage in Sandstorms, and the user ignores Sandstorm damage.

name: Sand Rush
description: The user’s SPE Boosts by +15 while in Sandstorms, and the user takes no damage from Sandstorms.

name: Sand Spit
description: When the user is hit by a Physical or Special Move, change the weather to Sandstorm for 5 rounds.

name: Sand Stream
description: When the user enters battle, change the Weather to Sandstorm for 5 rounds.

name: Sand Veil
description: The user gets +4 Evasion in a Sandstorm, and the user ignores Sandstorm damage.

name: Sap Sipper
description: The user is Immune to Grass. If a Grass Move hits the user, ignore its effects and Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Saturate
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Water-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Schooling
description: At level 4 or higher, Wishiwashi changes to School Form while its HP is above 3 Ticks.

name: Scrappy
description: Ghost-Types are not Immune to the user’s Normal or Fighting Moves, and the user ignores Intimidate, Unintimidate, Startle, Enthrall, and Chill.

name: Screen Cleaner
description: Remove the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil when the user enters battle.

name: Screen Saver
description: Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil all use the same Move Slot.

name: Seed Sower
description: When the user is hit by a Physical or Special Move, change the terrain to Grassy for 5 rounds.

name: Serene Grace
description: Double the Effect Rate of the user’s Moves.

name: Shadow Shield
description: If a Move damages the user at full HP, it gets -1 Effectiveness. This ability is unaffected by Mold Breaker.

name: Shadow Tag
description: Foes in the user’s Zone are Trapped unless they also have Shadow Tag.

name: Sharpness
description: Moves with with “sword”, “razor”, “blade”, “slash”, “cutter”, or “cleave” in the name, Aerial Ace, Cut, Dual Chop, X-Scissor, Cross Poison, Stone Axe, Ceaseless Edge, and Population Bomb get +7 damage.

name: Shed Skin
description: Between rounds, before taking damage from Status Problems, make a DC14 Save to cure the user of a Status Problem of your choice.

name: Sheer Force
description: Damaging Moves with effects get +5 damage, but their effects never happen.

name: Shell Armor
description: A protective shell deflects the user’s received Critical Hits into normal hits.

name: Shield Dust
description: The user is immune to the additional effects of damaging Moves.

name: Shields Down
description: When Minior is above 50% HP, it is in Meteor Form and can’t have Status Problems. Otherwise, Minior becomes Core Form.

name: Simple
description: The user’s Stats are doubly affected by Boosts and Drops. (The cap remains the same.)

name: Skill Link
description: Triple Axel, Triple Kick, Double Strike and Multi-Strike Moves always gain maximum bonus damage.

name: Slow Start
description: For 3 rounds after entering battle, halve the user’s ATK and SPE.

name: Slush Rush
description: The user’s SPE Boosts by +15 while in a snowstorm.

name: Sniper
description: When the user inflicts a Critical Hit, the bonus damage is +30 instead of +20.

name: Snow Cloak
description: The user gets +4 Evasion in a snowstorm.

name: Snow Warning
description: When the user enters battle, the weather becomes a snowstorm for 5 rounds.

name: Solar Power
description: In Harsh Sunlight, Boost the user’s SATK by +10 and lose 1 Tick between rounds.

name: Solid Rock
description: The user subtracts their Level from damage from incoming Super-Effective Moves.

name: Soul-Heart
description: When a Pokémon on the field faints, Boost the user’s SATK by +5.

name: Soundproof
description: The user is Immune to Sonic Moves.

name: Space Shifter
description:
When an X-Item is used on Deoxys, change its form:

  • X-Attack/X-Sp. Attack: Attack Form
  • X-Defense/X-Sp. Defense: Defense Form
  • X-Speed: Speed Form
  • Guard Spec.: Regular Form

name: Speed Boost
description: Boost the user’s SPE by +5 between rounds.

name: Stakeout
description: The user’s Moves that target foes that switched in this round get +1 Effectiveness. (Includes switch-ins replacing KOs.)

name: Stall
description: The user’s turn happens after other characters without Stall.

name: Stalwart
description: The user’s Moves cannot be redirected from their chosen target. (Including Ally Switch.)

name: Stamina
description: When a Move damages the user, Boost its DEF by +5.

name: Stance Change
description: Before the user uses a damaging Move, swap their ATK⇄DEF and SATK⇄SDEF until they use King’s Shield or leave battle.

name: Startle
description: When the user enters battle, Drop all foes’ SATK by -5.

name: Static
description: Attackers that hit the user with a Contact Move must make a DC8 Save using that attack roll or get Paralyzed.

name: Steadfast
description: When the user Flinches, Boost their SPE by +5.

name: Steam Engine
description: When the user is hit by a Water or Fire Move, Boost their SPE by +20.

name: Steel Toe
description: The user’s Moves with “Kick” or “Stomp” in their name and Triple Axel get +7 damage.

name: Steelworker
description: The user gets STAB for Steel Moves and can benefit from Steel Expert features.

name: Steely Spirit
description: The user and Allies in Zone get +5 damage on damaging Steel Moves.

name: Stench
description: The user Flinches targets on 19+. If a Move already has a chance to Flinch, increase that Effect Rate by +2.

name: Sticky Hold
description: The user’s held items can’t be stolen, switched, destroyed, or dropped.

name: Storm Drain
description: The user is Immune to Water. When the user is hit by a Water Move, ignore its effects and Boost their SATK by +5. Water Moves redirect to the user and can’t miss.

name: Strategist
description: The user’s Status Moves cost 2 less PP.

name: Strong Jaw
description: Moves with “Fang” or “Bite” in their name, Crunch, Egg Tooth, Fishious Rend, and Jaw Lock get +7 damage.

name: Sturdy
description: The user is immune to OHKO Moves. If damage would KO the user from full HP, instead set their HP to 1.

name: Suction Cups
description: The user can’t be forced to flee or switch out.

name: Sun Blanket
description: In Harsh Sunlight, Fire has -1 Effectiveness against the user, they get +5 DEF +5 SDEF, and they heal a Tick between rounds.

name: Super Luck
description: The user’s Moves are Critical Hits on 18+. If a Move already has a Crit Rate, add +2 to it.

name: Supreme Overlord
description: When the user enters battle, Boost their ATK and SATK each by +3 for every ally that Fainted this battle.

name: Surge Surfer
description: The user’s SPE Boosts by +15 while in Electric Terrain (even with Levitate).

name: Swarm
description: The user’s damaging Bug Moves get +10 damage when at 3 Ticks or less of HP.

name: Sweet Veil
description: The user and Allies in Zone are immune to Sleep.

name: Swift Swim
description: The user’s SPE Boosts by +15 while in Rain.

name: Sword of Ruin
description: The user’s ruinous steel blade gives -5 DEF to characters without Sword of Ruin.

name: Symbiosis
description: When an ally in Zone uses up an item, the user passes a held item to that ally.

name: Synchronize
description: Attackers that Burn, Paralyze, or Poison the user are inflicted with the same Status Problem.

name: Tablets of Ruin
description: The user’s ruinous wooden tablets give -5 ATK to characters without Tablets of Ruin.

name: Tail Bond
description: The user’s single-target Moves hit twice, but the second hit gets -2 Effectiveness.

name: Tangled Feet
description: While the user is Confused, Moves targeting the user double their Accuracy Check.

name: Tangling Hair
description: When the user is hit by a Contact Move, Drop the attacker’s SPE by -5.

name: Teamwork
description: If the user and any allies try to use the same Move in the same Round, then the user and all allies performing that Move get Advantage on their Attack Roll.

name: Technician
description: The user’s Moves with Multi-Strike, Double Strike, or Power of 6 or less get +6 damage.

name: Telepathy
description: The user is immune to allies’ damaging Moves.

name: Televize
description: The user’s Normal Moves become Psychic-Type and get +5 damage.

name: Tenacious
description: If a damaging Move would KO the user, they roll a DC 19 Save. On success, they endure with 1 HP instead.

name: Teravolt
description: The user’s Moves ignore others’ Abilities during the user’s turn.

name: Terraform
description: Terrain has no effect while the user is in battle.

name: Thermal Exchange
description: The user can’t be Burned, and when the user is hit by a Fire Move, Boost their ATK by +5.

name: Thick Fat
description: Fire and Ice get -1 Effectiveness against the user.

name: Thrown Bone
description: The user’s Moves with “Bone” in their name ignore Type Immunities.

name: Tinted Lens
description: The user’s Resisted Moves get +1 Effectiveness.

name: Torrent
description: The user’s damaging Water Moves get +10 damage when at 3 Ticks or less of HP.

name: Tough Claws
description: Contact Moves gain +5 damage.

name: Toxic Boost
description: When the user is Poisoned, Boost their ATK by +20. (This persists after curing the Poison.)

name: Toxic Debris
description: When the user is hit by a Physical Move, scatter a layer of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team.

name: Trace
description: When the user enters battle, it copies a random foe’s Ability of your choice.

name: Transistor
description: The user’s damaging Electric Moves get +5 damage.

name: Triage
description: The user’s Moves that heal HP get Priority, including Draining Moves.

name: Truant
description: The user can only use a Move every other turn (starting with the first.) Worry Seed, Simple Beam, and Entrainment can’t replace Truant.

name: Turboblaze
description: The user’s Moves ignore others’ Abilities during the user’s turn.

name: Unaware
description: When the user attacks or is attacked, ignore all Boosts and Drops.

name: Unburden
description: If the user consumes, drops or otherwise loses a Held Item, Boost their SPE by +10.

name: Unintimidate
description: When the user enters battle, their nonthreatening appearance Drops all foes’ DEF by -5.

name: Unnerve
description: Foes in Zone can’t eat Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
description: The user’s Contact Moves bypass Protection.

name: Vessel of Ruin
description: The user’s ruinous iron vessel gives -5 SATK to characters without Vessel of Ruin.

name: Victory Star
description: The user and their allies lower their Moves’ Accuracy Checks by 2.

name: Vital Spirit
description: If the user falls Asleep, cure them. The user can’t use Rest.

name: Volt Absorb
description: The user is Immune to Electric. When hit with an Electric Move, ignore its effects and they Heal 3 Ticks.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: When the user is hit with a Contact Move, swap Abilities with the attacker.

name: Water Absorb
description: The user is Immune to Water. When hit with a Water Move, ignore its effect and Heal the user by 3 Ticks.

name: Water Bubble
description: Fire gets -1 Effectiveness against the user, they can’t be Burned, and their damaging Water Moves get +5 damage.

name: Water Compaction
description: When the user is hit by a Water Move, Boost their DEF by +10.

name: Water Veil
description: If the user becomes Burned, cure them.

name: Weak Armor
description: When the user is hit by a Physical Move, Drop the user’s DEF by -5 and Boost SPE by +10.

name: Weathermon
description: Snowscape, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, Sunny Day, and Weather Ball all use the same Move Slot.

name: Well-Baked Body
description: The user is Immune to Fire. If a Fire Move hits the user, ignore its effects and Boost their DEF by +5.

name: White Smoke
description: The user’s Stats can’t be Dropped by others.

name: Wiggly
description: Other characters’ Physical and Special Moves target the user as if they had an Accuracy of -10. (Other targets of the Move are unaffected.)

name: Willpower
description: The user gets +5 Max PP.

name: Wimp Out
description: The user switches out/flees when another character’s Move drops their HP past 50%, even if Trapped.

name: Wind Power
description: The user becomes Charged when Tailwind or a Mysterious Air Current affects them, or when hit by a wind Move. (The user’s next Electric Move gets +1 Effectiveness, then they lose Charged. Wind Moves: have “Wind”, “Storm”, or “Blizzard” in the name, Gust, Twister, Leaf Tornado, Heat Wave, Air Cutter, and Hurricane.)

name: Wind Rider
description: Boost the user’s ATK by +5 when Tailwind or a Mysterious Air Current affects them, or when hit by a wind Move instead of being affected by it. (Wind Moves: have “Wind”, “Storm”, or “Blizzard” in the name, Gust, Twister, Leaf Tornado, Heat Wave, Air Cutter, and Hurricane.)

name: Wonder Guard
description: The user can’t be damaged by non-Super-Effective Moves, unless the user has no Weakness.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Other characters’ Status Moves target the user as if they had an Accuracy of -10. (Other targets of the Move are unaffected.)

name: Worker Bug
description: The user gets STAB for Bug Moves and can benefit from Bug Expert features.

name: X-Ray Vision
description: The user’s sight pierces surfaces. Ignore their targets’ Evasion.

name: Yardworker
description: The user gets STAB for Grass Moves and can benefit from Grass Expert features.

name: Zealous
description: The user’s damaging Moves get +5 damage, but also 1 Tick of recoil.

name: Zen Mode
description: If Darmanitan’s HP is under 50% between rounds, it changes into Zen forme. Otherwise, it returns to its regular forme. Zen forme has its own Move Slots and ignores the user’s other Abilities while active.

name: Zero to Hero
description: The user transforms into Hero Form for the rest of the battle once it switches out.

name: Hospitality
description: When the user enters battle, it heals each in-Zone ally for 3 Ticks each.

name: Supersweet Syrup
description: The first time the user enters battle, their sickly-sweet scent Drops all in-Zone foes’ Evasion by -1.

name: Toxic Chain
description: The user’s Moves Badly Poison targets on 14+.

name: Mind's Eye
description: The user ignores changes to foes’ Evasion, their Accuracy can’t be Dropped, and they can hit Ghost-Types with Normal- or Fighting-Type moves.

name: Embody Aspect
description: “The user’s heart fills with memories, causing the Teal/Wellspring/Hearthflame/Cornerstone Mask to shine and Boosting its [SPE/SDEF/ATK/DEF].”

name: Poison Puppeteer
description: Targets Poisoned by the user’s Moves also become Confused.

name: Tera Shift
description: When the user enters battle, they absorb energy and transform into their Terastal Form.

name: Tera Shell
description: “The user’s shell holds the powers of each type. All Moves that damage the user when their HP is full will not be very effective.”

name: Teraform Zero
description: “When the user changes into Stellar Form, their hidden powers eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.”
